title: Mahoutsukai to Dragon's Loft
original_name: 魔法使いと竜の屋根裏〈ドラゴンズロフト〉
sinopse:
The manga is set in a world where innumerable dragons appeared and ruled the skies before humanity had the chance to be able to fly. The story centers on Hitoe Tsurugi, a first-rate witch who flies through the skies freely on her broom.

(Source: ANN)
